articles.title: "Try 20% off your favorite fur, cashmere clothes, and differentiated custom wash."Cleantopia, a laun..
articles.author: Lee Hanna
articles.summary: Cleantopia has launched a pop-up store for its premium luxury laundry service, Black Label, at Hyundai Department Store's Mokdong branch. The pop-up offers customers the opportunity to experience the Black Label service and receive a 20% discount on on-site orders until March 16.

articles.title: Want to shop Canadian? This Port Moody student has developed an app to help
articles.author: Mario Bartel
articles.summary: Peter Iskakov launched the free Canalens app for iOS and Android phones. The app allows shoppers to take a photo of an item and learn if it originates in Canada or is made by a Canadian company. Iskakov plans to add a feature that gives each product a Canadian score and provide users with alternative suggestions.

articles.title: How a Man Made a Lot of Money by Selling Upside Down Ketchup Bottles
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Paul Brown invented a patented valve that revolutionized plastic bottles, most notably used in Heinz's upside-down ketchup bottles. This innovation allowed for a controlled squeeze of ketchup and became an instant hit, eventually becoming the industry standard. In 1995, Brown sold his company, Liquid Molding Systems, Inc., to AptarGroup for approximately $13 million.

articles.title: How Mondelez Will Sell America on Sour Patch Kids That Glow Under a Blacklight
articles.author: Megan Graham
articles.summary: Mondelez is launching a new version of Sour Patch Kids candy containing turmeric extract to give a fluorescent glow under blacklight. Additionally, Mondelez's brand Swedish Fish will introduce a new glowing product.

articles.title: I test cleaning products for a living: This 4-pound Shark vac is my new favorite
articles.summary: The Shark Ultracyclone System, a lightweight stick/handheld vacuum combo, is reviewed for its cleaning performance and ease of use. The vacuum features a flexible head, a hand vac attachment, and comes with a crevice tool and scrub brush. User reviews are positive, praising its suction power and maneuverability, making it suitable for quick, daily cleaning on hard floors.

articles.title: Lil Yachty Launches His Own New Tequila Seltzer
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Lil Yachty launched Yacht Water, a new tequila seltzer. This marks the introduction of a new product under Lil Yachty's brand.

articles.title: Nestle, Hidden Valley unveil new DiGiorno pizzas
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A company is introducing a brand new variety of a product and revamping another existing variety.

articles.title: I tested pancake makers for Shrove Tuesday… £25 winner was fun & delivered restaurant-quality crepes
articles.author: Consumer reporter
articles.summary: The article reviews various pancake and crepe makers from companies like Giles & Posner, Russell Hobbs, SugarWhisk, Drew & Cole, Wilko, and Lakeland. The reviews discuss features like ease of use, cooking time, pancake quality, versatility, and price, offering comparative insights for consumers considering purchasing these products.

articles.title: I tested pancake makers for Shrove Tuesday… £25 winner was fun & delivered restaurant-quality crepes
articles.author: Lynsey Hope
articles.summary: The article reviews multiple pancake-making gadgets, including the Giles & Posner mini snack maker, Russell Hobbs crepe and pancake frying pan, SugarWhisk double mini pancake maker, Drew & Cole 5-Minute Clever Chef, Blue Mini pancake and cookie maker, Lakeland 2-in-1 waffle and pancake maker and Russell Hobbs pancake and crepe maker. It assesses their ease of use, cooking time, consistency of the pancakes produced, and overall value, highlighting features like non-stick surfaces, adjustable thermostats, and versatility for making other foods.

articles.title: Seedless Launches to Revolutionize Enterprise AI Training with Fictional Data
articles.author: Seedless
articles.summary: Seedless has launched a new platform designed to address data scarcity in enterprise AI by generating fully synthetic, privacy-compliant, and realistic business data. This platform utilizes a patent-pending, agent-based simulation process and aims to enable organizations to train and evaluate AI tools without risking sensitive information, focusing on industries like Finance, Healthcare, and Legal.

articles.title: February's 18 Most Exciting Beauty Launches, According To Our Editors
articles.author: Rachel Lapidos
articles.summary: Several beauty companies launched new products. Kylie Cosmetics released Cosmic 2.0 fragrance, Oribe launched Serene Scalp line with a Treatment Spray, and U Beauty debuted a fragrance. Tilt launched Lashscape Lengthening Mascara, Saltair announced the launch of its Multi-Lipid Body Butter, eos' Cashmere Lip Butter, Loops mask, Kosas Cloud Set Powder , YSL Beauty launched Make Me Blush 24H Buildable Powder Blush, Native launched body wash, Augustinus Bader launched sheet mask.

articles.title: The Dyson V8 Absolute cordless vacuum is $170 off for a limited-time
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a $170 discount on the Dyson V8 Absolute cordless stick vacuum, bringing the price down to $349.99. The vacuum features two cleaner heads: the Fluffy™ cleaner head for hard floors and the Motorbar™ cleaner head for carpets. It also has a fully sealed filtration system.

articles.title: The evolution of AI: From AlphaGo to AI agents, physical AI, and beyond
articles.author: John Lee
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT in November 2022, a large language model capable of generating human-like text, demonstrating the potential of AI in areas like customer service and content creation. The rise of agentic AI, capable of reasoning and task execution, is transforming organizational operations by autonomously pursuing complex goals.

articles.title: MrBeast buzz risks being new media's old story
articles.author: Jennifer Saba
articles.summary: MrBeast is reportedly seeking to raise $200 million for his business at a $5 billion valuation. The funds would support a holding company that owns his production studio, chocolate line Feastables, and snack-maker Lunchly. This indicates an expansion and development phase for MrBeast's product-related ventures.

articles.title: This new kitchen gadget can make all the frozen treats you desire
articles.summary: Ninja Swirl by Creami, a new kitchen gadget, has been introduced to make frozen treats, including soft-serve desserts. The gadget builds upon Ninja Creami, offering an upgraded experience for users. Good Housekeeping testers highlighted its expanded dessert options and practical design.

articles.title: Dyson users are loving a £130 cordless vacuum in the Amazon sale
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: SMOTURE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is being offered at a reduced price of £129.99. Similarly, Shark has reduced the price of the Shark Anti Hair Wrap Cordless Vacuum from £249.99 to £179.99.  Shoppers are comparing the SMOTURE vacuum to Dyson vacuums due to its features like upright standing, easy operation, and effective cleaning on various surfaces.

articles.title: These 9 chic, functional home finds have 'rich mom' energy — all for under $30
articles.summary: The article promotes the introduction of new, affordable home products. A luxe gold squeegee and Sleek Socket are highlighted as examples of stylish and functional solutions for everyday needs, available for purchase on Amazon.

articles.title: ‘Redefining what it means to create': CU Boulder alum aims to revolutionize sound design
articles.author: Olivia Doak
org: Center for African and African American Studies
articles.summary: Noctal, a sound design startup, has launched an AI-powered platform to automate sound design for content creators. The platform identifies action sequences in videos and accurately places relevant sound files based on on-screen events, aiming to streamline the traditionally time-intensive sound development process in film and media.

articles.title: 'Quiet' dehumidifier that 'helps dry clothes by morning' now on sale with 64% off
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Debenhams has significantly reduced the price of its Neo 12L Day Dehumidifier with LED Digital Display from £179.99 to £65.32. Dunelm is also offering its Indoor 20L Dehumidifier at a reduced price of £126, down from £180.

articles.title: What if You Could Taste Food From 1,000 Miles Away?
articles.author: Veronique Greenwood
articles.summary: Ohio State University researchers, led by Yizhen Jia and Jinghua Li, have developed a microfluidics-based device capable of transmitting tastes remotely. The device uses miniature pumps to deliver flavor samples, like lemonade, coffee, or fish soup, generated from sensors or chemical recipes, to the user. The team is working on making the device more miniature and enhancing the sensory experience by incorporating textures and scents.

articles.title: Shark sale sees Steam Mop that 'makes cleaning a breeze' reduced to under £40
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Shark has introduced the Steam Cleaner featuring removable, machine-washable dirt pads and a 375ml water tank. Amazon customers have shared positive reviews, praising its ease of use and cleaning effectiveness. However, some users suggest considering alternatives due to the absence of an on/off switch.

articles.title: I dropped the new Yeti Ranchero Backpack off a cliff. It survived and I love it
articles.author: Kai Burkhardt
articles.summary: Yeti launched two new backpacks, the Ranchero 27L and 22L, built for durability and organization. The Ranchero 27L is a commuter pack while the 22L is a streamlined design for shorter trips. They feature a three-zipper design influenced by the Mystery Ranch acquisition, and are available in multiple colors.

articles.title: Best Peach lipsticks for a soft feminine look this summer season; Say hello to bright and subtle fashion!
articles.summary: Maybelline New York introduced Color Sensational Creamy Matte, Ultimattes, and Superstay Vinyl Ink lipsticks with various finishes. Lakme launched 9 to 5 Primer + Matte and Absolute Skin Dew Satin lipsticks. Mars unveiled Won't Smudge Won't Budge Matte Lip Crayon, while Blue Heaven presented Cookie Crush Chocolate Flavored Soft Matte Lipstick. Sugar launched Play Smooth Operator Lip Crayon, Mattlook introduced Matinee Matte Non-Transfer Lipstick, and Coloressence released Pure Matte Lip Color.

articles.title: Dunkin' Opens 'Next Generation' Store In North Babylon
articles.author: Jade Eckardt
articles.summary: Dunkin' has opened a new next-generation store in North Babylon, NY, on February 11th. The new design includes an innovative iced beverage tap system and an updated bakery case. A grand opening celebration is planned for April 30th, featuring a donation to a local organization and giveaways.

articles.title: J&K Bank opens new branch at Umerabad
articles.author: Gk News Service
articles.summary: J&K Bank has launched a new branch in Umerabad, Srinagar, offering a full range of financial services. These services include savings accounts, business accounts, agricultural loans, personal loans, MSME financing, and digital banking facilities. The bank aims to provide convenient and affordable solutions to residents and businesses in the area.

articles.title: I Turned Iconic Fast Food Items Into Chaotic Soda Flavors — Would You Try Any Of These?
articles.author: Aaron Hirsch
articles.summary: BuzzFeed has launched a new interactive service called 'Soda Flavor Generator'. This tool transforms popular fast food items into soda flavors, allowing users to experiment and share their creations.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A release date, starter Pokemon and Mega Evolutions revealed
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: A new Pokémon game is launching with features including Zygarde, Mega Evolutions, and a new battling system.

articles.title: Kia reveals new PV5 Passenger and Cargo models
articles.author: Motoring Staff
articles.summary: Kia has revealed its new PV5 Passenger and Cargo models, all-electric vehicles designed to compete with rivals such as the Vw ID. Buzz. These models are the first production vehicles to debut under Kia's Platform Beyond Vehicle (PBV) global business strategy.

articles.title: GU Announces New Clothing Line "UG" from UNDERCOVER / Jun Takahashi
articles.summary: GU, a UNIQLO sister brand, is launching "UG", a new product line in partnership with UNDERCOVER. The launch date is set for Friday, March 14, 2025.

articles.title: The best Samsung tablets for 2025, fully tested by an expert. Is one of these the iPad-slayer?
articles.author: Britta O'Boyle
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Tab S10 series, including the S10 Plus and S10 Ultra, as its latest premium tablets, featuring AMOLED displays, powerful processors, and AI capabilities. The company also offers the Galaxy Tab S9 FE as a mid-range option and the Galaxy Tab A9 for budget-conscious consumers, providing a range of choices to suit different needs and budgets.

articles.title: Ninja drinks gadget that's 'perfect' for anyone who goes to the office or gym reduced to £25 from £40
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Blast Cordless Portable Blender, a rechargeable USB-C powered blender designed for making smoothies and protein shakes on the go. Customers praise its blending efficiency, ease of use, portability, and value for money, highlighting its suitability for gym-goers and office workers.

articles.title: Introducing our new Terms of Service - The Python Package Index Blog
articles.summary: PyPI is introducing a new Terms of Service to formalize its relationship with users. This update aims to enable PyPI to move forward with providing new features and services, specifically Organization Accounts.

articles.title: J&K Bank opens new branch at Umerabad — The Kashmir Monitor
articles.summary: J&K Bank has launched a new branch in Umerabad to provide a full range of financial services, including savings accounts, business accounts, loans, and digital banking facilities. The bank aims to serve the financial needs of businesses and residents in the growing commercial and residential area.

articles.title: The Welsh eco-friendly solid soap dispenser firm backed by Dragons' Den
articles.author: Sion Barry
articles.summary: Snoap, a Monmouth-based venture, has launched an innovative solid soap dispenser and secured a £50,000 investment on BBC's Dragons' Den. The product, a hand soap dispensing system designed with sustainability at its core, replaces 20 plastic soap bottles with two bar soaps. Deborah Meaden and Peter Jones invested in Snoap, taking a joint 7.5% equity stake.

articles.title: New Year, New You Giveaway: A New Dawn Solutions
articles.author: Dakota News Now staff
articles.summary: A New Dawn Solutions, a professional organizing company, is sponsoring a giveaway for a $50 gift certificate towards a 'vacation paradise package.' This promotion aims to help individuals declutter their spaces and minds, indirectly promoting a service or packaged service for vacation preparedness.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy 25 series sets 1 million-unit sales record
articles.author: JIN EUN-SOO
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics' Galaxy S25 series reached 1 million units sold within 21 days of launch, surpassing previous Galaxy series. The success is attributed to its AI features, powerful performance, slim design and subscription model, which offers after-sales service and discounts to younger customers.

articles.title: Musk's Grok 3 AI has adult 'sexy' and 'unhinged' modes sparking fears for kids
articles.author: Jerry Lawton
articles.summary: xAI launched Grok 3, a new version of its Grok chatbot, featuring a 'sexy mode' that offers users adult experiences. This new feature is currently limited to subscribers of X's Premium Plus tier and is accessible as a standalone app or through the X platform. The daily active usage of Grok increased by 330% in the US after this launch.

articles.title: Amazon cuts almost £90 off Shark FlexFusion Multi Hot Air Styler
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Shark is offering the FlexFusion Multi Hot Air Styler, Hair Dryer & Ceramic Straightener, a new product with 5 Styling Attachments. This product, currently discounted on Amazon, offers wet-to-dry styling technology and multiple attachments for curling and straightening. Customer reviews on Amazon give an average rating of 4.3 stars. It is being compared to product like Dyson kit, or the Zen.Ten 5 in 1 Air Wrap Styler

articles.title: Report: Meta to Debut Stand-Alone Meta AI App During Q2
articles.author: Adweek
articles.summary: Meta is planning to launch a new app, expanding its portfolio of existing applications.

articles.title: 'Clean' cleaning products build a big business, $50M and counting, near Traverse City
articles.author: Crain's Detroit Business
articles.summary: Stephen Ezell launched Truly Free Market as an alternative for online sellers, allowing them to build their brand and own customer relationships. This marketplace emerged after Ezell's experience with his soap company, Selestial Soap LLC, and the challenges he faced on other established platforms like Amazon. Truly Free Market gained traction and grew substantially, especially during the COVID-19 pandemic due to increased demand for soap products.

articles.title: 'Surprisingly powerful' pressure washer leaves patio 'spotless'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Yimbly, an online marketplace by Reach Plc, is offering the Durhand portable pressure washer for £90.99. This pressure washer boasts an 1800w motor, 150 bar pressure, and adjustable nozzle. Karcher has also reduced the price of their High Pressure K5 Washer to £299.99.

articles.title: Google's new hub explained: manage your Pixel and Nest devices with ease
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Google launched a new "Your Devices" page on the Google Store, providing users with a centralized hub to manage their Made by Google devices. The page displays device information like warranty status and serial numbers, and offers options for repair, finding the device, and contacting Google support. The page is currently available in the US.

articles.title: Why is everyone using Pantene again, and should you? We asked experts
articles.author: Shannon Garlin
articles.summary: Pantene has updated its product line with new formulas, including sulfate-free options and the Gold Series, designed for textured hair. The brand offers a wide range of products for different hair types, addressing consumer demand and hair care needs. These products include shampoos, conditioners, hairsprays, masks, and styling products formulated with ingredients like argan oil and Pro-Vitamin B5.

articles.title: Elon Musk's risqué Grok AI chatbot offers challenge to risk-averse rivals
articles.author: Cristina Criddle
articles.summary: xAI launched new voice functionalities for its Grok chatbot, including preset personalities like 'romantic,' 'sexy,' and 'unhinged' (18+). The Grok chatbot now offers voice conversation capabilities with these distinct personalities.

articles.title: Elon Musk's risqué Grok AI chatbot offers challenge to risk-averse rivals 马斯克旗下AI聊天机器人试图用成人内容吸引用户
articles.summary: xAI, led by Elon Musk, is enhancing its artificial intelligence model to provide users with more risqué answers compared to its competitors. This strategy aims to attract users, potentially with adult content.

articles.title: Why I Prefer to Stick to My Default Android Launcher
articles.author: Alvin Wanjala
articles.summary: Google's Pixel Launcher on Pixel phones offers simplicity and speedy updates with seamless OS integration. Nova Launcher, a third-party option acquired by Branch Metrics, faced layoffs, hindering updates and causing compatibility issues. The Pixel Launcher prioritizes reliable support and consistent user experience, unlike the uncertain future of third-party alternatives.

articles.title: Trendyol launches trendyol collection home for Azerbaijani users (PHOTO)
articles.summary: Trendyol launched its 'Trendyol Collection Home' homewares range in Azerbaijan, expanding its product offerings. The new range includes bedding sets, bath accessories, towels, tablecloths, and decorative pillows. Azerbaijani users can access 33,000 home textile and household items across nearly 100 product options.

articles.title: LilySilk's New York Concept Store Launch: A Global Expansion with a Stunning Retail Experience
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: LILYSILK has launched its first concept store in New York City's Meatpacking District on Feb 27, 2025. The store, located at 654 Hudson Street, offers LILYSILK's signature products like silk apparel, bedding, and accessories while emphasizing sustainable practices, including recycled materials, energy-efficient lighting, and eco-friendly packaging.

articles.title: Braun Series 9 Pro+ review: is this the most advanced electric shaver yet?
articles.author: Leon Poultney
articles.summary: The Braun Series 9 Pro+ Electric Shaver is introduced as an advanced electric shaver designed for a clean shave with minimal irritation, featuring Sonic Technology and a portable PowerCase for extended battery life. It also comes with an automated cleaning dock. Telegraph's test results for the product highlights the product's closeness of shave and comfort as 10/10.

articles.title: Small chicken shop takes on global fast food giant KFC over its new sandwich
articles.author: ZAK WHEELER
articles.summary: KFC launched a new product called 'Zinger Bánh Mì' in Newcastle for $9.95 as part of its secret menu, available until March 24, during a limited trial run to test customer preferences. NFC also launched a similar 'banh mi sando' as a weekly special.

articles.title: Food Allergy App Launches 'Allergy Friendly Canada' section to Spotlight Local Brands
articles.summary: Flappd Tech Inc., the creators of the Food Allergy App, has launched 'Allergy Friendly Canada,' a new online resource for Canadian consumers. This section allows users to filter brands by specific allergens and region and is optimized for search engines and promoted via SEM, SMM, and PR channels.

articles.title: The Birth Of Afro Sheen: How Chicago's George E. Johnson Changed The Black Hair Game Forever
articles.author: Atavia Reed
articles.summary: George E. Johnson founded Johnson Products Company in 1954, launching products like Ultra Wave Hair Culture and Afro Sheen. These hair care products, especially Afro Sheen, helped Black people express themselves and were advertised during 'Soul Train.' Today, an Ultra Sheen Supreme Relaxer, marketed as containing no lye, is available.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends Z-A trailer, new mobile game announced at Pokémon Presents showcase
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Game Freak is developing Pokemon Legends: Z-A for Nintendo Switch, scheduled for release in late 2025, reintroducing Mega Evolutions. The Pokemon Company announced Pokemon Champions, a battle-focused game for Nintendo Switch and mobile devices, featuring familiar battle mechanics and cross-platform play. Both games were revealed at the Pokemon Presents showcase.

articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg's Meta targets ChatGPT with plans to release standalone AI app: report
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Meta Platforms intends to test a paid subscription service for its AI-enabled chatbot, Meta AI. This new service is similar to subscription models offered by OpenAI and Microsoft for their advanced chatbots.

articles.title: Like you just left the dentist's office! Shop the 'space age' smart toothbrush that removes 15x more plaque for a deeper, fresher clean
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: Quip launched the Ultra Next Generation Smart Sonic Electric Toothbrush. This toothbrush removes up to 15 times more plaque than manual toothbrushes and includes features like 10 levels of personalized power controlled by an LED touch bar, a two-minute timer, and a pulse function. The EasyClick Brush Pod produces 70% less waste and it is available in five colors.

articles.title: Sigma360 Announces GenAI Innovations to Transform Financial Crime Compliance
articles.author: Sigma360
articles.summary: Sigma360 launched three new GenAI-based product enhancements as feature add-ons to its existing risk screening and monitoring platform. These enhancements can function together or independently, targeting key compliance challenges.

articles.title: MiniMax Image-01: Chinese Company MiniMax Introduces New Photorealistic AI Model Promises Generation of Cinematic-Quality Images at Lower Cost
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: MiniMax has launched MiniMax Image-01, a photorealistic text-to-image AI model offering cinematic-quality images with high prompt-to-image fidelity. The model enables the creation of detailed scenes and characters at any canvas size, claiming to provide better quality at 1/10th of the cost.

articles.title: Make white clothes bright again with 69p laundry trick that 'lifts stains'
articles.author: Melanie Kaidan
articles.summary: Fabric Online owner, Thomas Bird, suggests using lemon juice as a natural bleaching agent to brighten white clothes and remove stains. Lemon juice, costing only 69p, is added to the washing machine along with regular detergent as an alternative to chemical whiteners.

articles.title: New Algarve brand launched
org: Algarve Regional Coordination and Development Commission
articles.summary: The Algarve region launched 'Saborear o Algarve,' a new brand to unite local producers and promote regional products. The Algarve Local Producers Network will exclusively use the brand to differentiate and add value to the products, and the project aims to reach at least 100 associated producers.

articles.title: Hoover's vacuum cleaner is £170 off that sees shoppers ditching Dyson
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Hoover is offering its HF9 Pet Cordless Vacuum Cleaner With Anti Hair Wrap for £149 with the code HF9-SAVE, a discount of £170 from the original price of £319. The vacuum features anti-hair wrap technology, a motorised 'Mini Turbo Pets Brush,' over 30 minutes of runtime, and the ability to switch between hard floor and carpet modes.  Shark and Dyson are also offering discounts on their cordless vacuums.

articles.title: Lidl is selling a handy gadget that's £190 cheaper than Karcher perfect for getting your garden ready for spring
articles.author: Laura McGuire
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Parkside Pressure Washer for £119, a cheaper alternative to the Karcher high pressure washer. Additionally, Lidl has launched the Beldray AIRAPID Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, priced at £49.99 for Lidl Plus members.

articles.title: Lidl is selling a handy gadget that's £190 cheaper than Karcher perfect for getting your garden ready for spring
articles.author: Laura Mcguire
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Parkside Pressure Washer, a cheaper alternative to Karcher's high-pressure washer, in stores next Thursday, March 6, for £119.  The store has also launched the Beldray AIRAPID Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, a dupe of the Dyson vacuum, which costs £49.99 for Lidl Plus members and £54.99 for non-members.

articles.title: Is the revolution already here? We tried Dyson's new washer-vacuum
articles.author: DAVID ROSENTHAL
articles.summary: Dyson launched the WashG1 in 2024, a wireless floor washer designed to combine water distribution, absorption, and suction technologies. This product features two separately driven rollers, a clean water tank with a 1-liter capacity, and a dirty water tank with a 0.8-liter capacity, and offers three settings with further sensitivity adjustments, aiming to efficiently remove both wet and dry dirt.

articles.title: Nockta Unveils New Brand Identity to Reflect Growth and Evolving Digital Strategies
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Nockta, a digital marketing agency, has rebranded to reflect its growth and expanded capabilities. The rebrand aligns with its new service offerings that include new generation websites, 3D-rendered objects, High-quality 3D and 2D animation, Headless platform development, AI-like new generation tools, addressing the increasing needs of clients.

articles.title: Simple changes to make now for healthier, glowing skin in spring
articles.author: Isobel Pankhurst
articles.summary: Fat Cow SkinCare's expert Ryan Porter recommends switching to lighter, water-based moisturizers and increasing sun protection as the weather warms up. Porter advises using SPF 30 even on cloudy days and suggests gentle exfoliation to remove dead skin cells, using mild products like lactic acid or plant enzymes.

articles.title: Tecno Spark Slim is the closest thing we have to an iPhone 17 Air
articles.summary: Tecno has unveiled the Spark Slim, a new ultra-thin smartphone featuring a 6.78-inch 3D curved AMOLED display, a 5,200 mAh battery, and dual 50-megapixel cameras. The Spark Slim's design measures just 5.75 mm thick and utilizes recycled aluminum and stainless steel in its construction. Its specifications include a 1.5K resolution display with a 144Hz refresh rate and support for 45W fast charging.

articles.title: Equus Compute Solutions' Yazz Krdzalic on Innovation as a Service
articles.summary: Equus Compute Solutions (ECS) is offering "innovation as a service", allowing customers to focus on operations without managing digital infrastructure. This service includes technologies like immersion cooling systems and private 5G networks to improve compute power and security, driving digital transformation. ECS emphasizes strategic partnerships to offer comprehensive solutions addressing customer pain points.

articles.title: I'm Still Not a Fan of Open-Ear Earbuds, but These Are Pretty Great
articles.author: Gavin Phillips
articles.summary: Nothing launched the Nothing Ear (open) in September 2024 for $149. These open-ear earbuds feature curved hooks, IP54 water resistance, 14.2mm drivers, customizable EQ via the Nothing X app, and AI Clear Voice Technology. The earbuds offer 6-7 hours of battery life with an additional 30 hours from the charging case.

articles.title: Google Ads Introduces AI-Powered Creative Tools for Advertisers
articles.author: Grace Ashiru
articles.summary: Google Ads has introduced new AI-powered creative tools, including the ability to generate lifestyle images from text prompts using the Imagen 3 model. These tools enable advertisers to create customized visuals and optimize creative workflows across platforms like Performance Max, Demand Gen, Display, and Apps campaigns. The AI-generated images also feature SynthID, a digital watermark, for transparency.

articles.title: Hoover cordless vacuum is 'twice as powerful' as Shark and now under £150
articles.author: Jake Hackney Reporter
articles.summary: Hoover is offering a discount on its HF9 Pet Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, reducing the price from £319 to £149 with a special voucher code. Shark has also reduced the price of its Anti Hair Wrap Cordless Pet Vacuum and is including a free car detailing kit with purchase. Dyson is offering a discount on its V8 vacuum, bringing the price down to £249.99.

articles.title: Fayetteville's new snack shop offers trendy bites and DIY ramen experience
articles.author: Lizmary Evans
articles.summary: Sun Lite, a new convenience store by Sun Asian Market, is launching in Fayetteville on February 28th. The store features a do-it-yourself ramen station and a curated selection of international snacks, including Korean corn dogs and pre-packaged frozen meals. The store aims to offer a trendy snack experience with popular international treats.

articles.title: Aurzen Zip tri-fold projector review: mirror anything (without DRM)
articles.author: Thomas Ricker
articles.summary: Aurzen is launching the Zip tri-fold projector, a compact, battery-powered projector, initially priced at $249. The Zip connects to iPhones and Android devices wirelessly and automatically focuses the image. It is suitable for users without laptops for entertainment and presentations.

articles.title: 'Soft and cosy' £48 Next fleece that's 'perfect for cold weather'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is offering the Abstract Print Woven Mix Teddy Borg Fleece Popper Front Jacket, priced at £48. The jacket features a beige, red and khaki green borg fleece fabric, a funnel neck, side pockets, and a popper fastening, and it is available in multiple colors. The jacket has received positive reviews for its style and warmth.

articles.title: Amazon reduces 'America's number one bestselling haircare oil' that UK fans call 'a miracle'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of Moroccanoil Treatment Original, a popular hair treatment oil. The 100ml bottle, normally priced at £38.50, is currently available at a discounted rate. The product is described as softening hair, improving hydration, detangling, smoothing frizz and flyaways, and boosting shine.

articles.title: This ingenious 3-in-1 robot vacuum managed to replace all my floor cleaning gadgets – including my Dyson stick vac
articles.author: Alistair Charlton
articles.summary: Eufy has launched the E20, a three-in-one vacuum that functions as a self-emptying robot vacuum, a stick vacuum, and a handheld vacuum. The E20 boasts strong suction and is controlled via the Eufy app for adjusting settings and scheduling cleanings.

articles.title: Nuxe launches Very Rose Plumping Lip Serum in new-look range
articles.author: Faye Bartle
articles.summary: Nuxe has launched the Very Rose Plumping Lip Serum, a new addition to its Very Rose range. The 8ml serum contains rose oil extract and natural hyaluronic acid for volumizing and moisturizing, along with pepper fruit extract and menthol. The Very Rose range also features less plastic packaging for 2025.

articles.title: Burger place confirmed for spot next to new Starbucks. What we know.
articles.author: Daniel Schemer
org: Office of Economic and Community Development
articles.summary: Mad for Burgers, a new burger restaurant, is planning to open in Taunton, Massachusetts, by late summer. The restaurant will offer a simple menu of burgers, fries, sodas, and shakes at affordable prices, with a hamburger, fries, and a drink combo costing roughly $11. The Taunton location will serve as a prototype for the restaurant.

articles.title: Save £54 in Samsung Galaxy Tablet deal that's 'much cheaper than an iPad'
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Amazon offers a limited-time deal on the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9, reducing its price by £54. The tablet is praised for its fast performance, clear screen, and long-lasting battery by some users, while others report disappointing battery life. Currys also offers discount on budget-friendly tablet.

articles.title: Naver has declared a full-scale war on Coupang as it unveiled its shopping application (app) launch ..
articles.author: Park Hong Ju
articles.summary: Naver is launching the 'Naver Plus Store' shopping app and 'Naver Delivery' service, featuring guaranteed delivery options like same-day, next-day, and specified-date delivery.  Naver membership members will receive benefits such as free delivery on purchases over 10,000 won, and free returns and exchanges, with Naver covering the return delivery and disposal costs.

articles.title: Tencent releases new AI model, says replies faster than DeepSeek-R1
articles.author: CNA
articles.summary: Tencent launched Hunyuan Turbo S, a new AI model, that answers queries faster than DeepSeek's R1. Alibaba also released Qwen 2.5-Max model and announced an investment in AI and cloud computing. These AI models are being integrated into various services by companies like Huawei, Vivo, Oppo and telecom operators China Mobile, China Unicom and China Telecom.

articles.title: Version 2.0
articles.summary: QuickJS has launched Version 2.0, featuring a complete rewrite of the data exchange layer for improved efficiency and a simplified API. The new version includes TypeScript support, enabling TypeScript execution within the sandbox by transpiling it to JavaScript. Additionally, QuickJS v2 offers full async support via the Emscripten async variant.

articles.title: With the group Newzins (NJZ) opening a new official SNS account, Odor said it was "an act that viola..
articles.author: Lee Da Gyeom
articles.summary: Newzins (NJZ), formerly New Jeans, will release a new song at Complex Live, a side event concert of ComplexCon, held in Hong Kong on March 23. The group has also opened new official accounts on TikTok, X (formerly Twitter), and YouTube named 'NJZ'.

articles.title: How To Start a WhatsApp Chat With ChatGPT Using Phone Number
articles.author: Innovation Village
articles.summary: OpenAI has introduced new features for ChatGPT, allowing users to interact with the chatbot through phone calls and WhatsApp messaging. Users can now call the chatbot using a U.S. or Canadian phone number.

articles.title: HONOR Magic7 RSR: A phone engineered for the fast lane
articles.author: Kushmita Bose
articles.summary: HONOR has launched the PORSCHE DESIGN HONOR Magic7 RSR, their latest ultra-premium flagship smartphone, in collaboration with Porsche Design. The phone boasts AI-enhanced features, Porsche-inspired design, and a cutting-edge MagicOS 9.0 operating system. It is available in two Porsche exterior colors: Agate Grey and Provence.

articles.title: Tencent releases new AI model, says replies faster than DeepSeek-R1
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Tencent has launched Hunyuan Turbo S, a new AI model, which responds to queries faster than DeepSeek's R1. Tencent also stated the new Turbo S has usage costs cheaper than previous versions. Alibaba also released the Qwen 2.5-Max model.

articles.title: Android 16 Beta 2.1 Unveiled: Resolves Doze Mode and Random Reboot Issues
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Google rolled out Android 16 Beta 2.1, addressing bugs and enhancing system stability for Pixel devices, including fixes for Doze mode and animation choppiness.  Android 16 introduces Advanced Protection APIs, allowing apps to detect when Android 16's high-security mode is active, adjusting their behavior for enhanced security.  These updates aim to deliver a seamless and reliable experience, and developers are encouraged to explore and integrate these new features into their apps.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Official Announcement Date Reportedly Set for April 16
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to fully unveil the Galaxy S25 Edge at an online event scheduled for April 16. This smartphone features a 200MP primary camera, 50MP ultrawide lens, Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and an ultra-thin 6.4mm frame, available in Light Blue, Black, and Silver, with an expected May 2024 release. The initial production will be limited to 40,000 units.

articles.title: Zion Williamson is DOMINATING right now for New Orleans Pelicans
articles.summary: KENS 5 requires users to download the KENS 5 app to stream their content on phones.

articles.title: South Korean lifestyle brand Wiggle Wiggle to hold pop-up in Singapore, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: Wiggle Wiggle, a South Korean lifestyle brand known for vibrant daily essentials, is launching its first and largest Southeast Asian pop-up store in Singapore. While the exact location and opening date are yet to be announced, the pop-up will showcase Wiggle Wiggle's range of products, including kitchenware, stationery, and fashion.

articles.title: Shaping the AI Future: TECNO to Showcase Next-Gen AI Ecosystem at MWC Barcelona 2025
articles.author: Ynaija
articles.summary: TECNO will showcase its next-generation AI ecosystem at MWC Barcelona 2025. The company plans to introduce new AI products at the event.

articles.title: A revolutionary new dry shampoo is here. But at what cost?
articles.summary: K18 Hair launched AirWash, a new-generation dry shampoo. AirWash promises odor elimination, hair and scalp health, wash time extension up to three days, and oil absorption using translucent microbeads that leave no residue, activated using a hairdryer.

articles.title: Amazon's 'powerful' spot cleaner for £90 'cleans everything easy' and is 'great for carpets'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Amazon offers a spot cleaner praised for its 'powerful suction' and effectiveness in removing pet messes and tough stains. Features include antimicrobial bristles and a slim design. User reviews highlight its success on car mats and carpets, with one mentioning its superior performance compared to rental units.

articles.title: Something Smells in Marketing's Future
articles.summary: OVR Technology launched Architecture of Scent technology for programming scents into digital environments. Aryballe Technologies specializes in digital olfaction for industries like automotive and healthcare. Olorama, inspired by Smell-O-Vision, offers scented VR experiences, and Inhalio provides a digital scent AI platform for large corporations, showcasing new product introductions in scent marketing.

articles.title: ସାମସଙ୍ଗ ଲଞ୍ଚ କଲା ଆଉ 2ଟି 5G ସ୍ମାର୍ଟଫୋନ; ଦାମ ₹9,999ରୁ ଆରମ୍ଭ
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Samsung has launched two new budget 5G smartphones in the Indian market: the Galaxy M16 5G and the Galaxy M06 5G. The Galaxy M16 5G features a triple camera setup with a 50MP main camera, while the Galaxy M06 5G has a dual camera setup, also with a 50MP main camera. The Galaxy M16 5G will be available for sale starting March 5, while the Galaxy M06 5G will be available on Amazon starting March 7.

articles.title: Nuu Mobile N30 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Nuu Mobile officially announced the N30 smartphone in Q1 2025. The budget smartphone features a 6.7-inch display, MediaTek Helio G81 processor, 6GB RAM, 128GB internal storage, a 50MP main camera, and an 8MP front camera, powered by a 5000 mAh battery and runs on Android 14.

articles.title: Dreame unveils new robot vacuums with exclusive savings & S$1.4K in freebies for the first 100 customers
articles.author: Kim Tan
articles.summary: Dreame has launched its new X50 series robot vacuums, including the Ultra and Master models, featuring ProLeap system for obstacle climbing and HyperStream Detangling DuoBrush for hair removal. The X50 series will be available on Shopee starting March 2nd, with launch prices and freebies for the first 100 buyers of the Ultra model.

articles.title: New leak hints at the official launch date for the Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch its new product, the Galaxy S25 Edge, soon.

articles.title: Remember when Google's Nexus 5 turned the Android world on its head
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: In 2013, Google and LG collaborated to launch the Nexus 5 phone, which gained significant attention in the Android market.

articles.title: Affordable Vivo Y29: Large Battery and Resilient Design Unveiled
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Vivo Indonesia has launched the Vivo Y29 smartphone, emphasizing its durability and long battery life. The Y29 features a 6500 mAh battery, 'SGS 5-Star + military Drop Resistance standard certification,' and 'IP69 certification' for water and dust resistance. It also has a Qualcomm Snapdragon 685 chipset, a 6.68-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate and dual stereo speakers.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge launch date tipped: Here's when the slimmer flagship may debut
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch a new, slimmer model in its Galaxy S25 series, called the Galaxy S25 Edge, possibly around April 16th. The phone may feature a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, a dual-camera setup with a 200MP main lens and a 50MP ultrawide lens, and a 3,900mAh battery.

articles.title: New Look's 'gorgeous' £28 black midi dress that shoppers say they 'need'
articles.author: Jodie Bradley
articles.summary: New Look has launched its new Black Tie Front Jersey Midi Dress, available in black, brown, and dark green, for £28. The dress features a tie-waist design and has received positive feedback from customers on social media. The company promoted this new dress on Instagram.

articles.title: I Tried the Snail Sex Toy and Here's My Honest Review
articles.author: Kayla Kibbe
articles.summary: The 'snail vibe' is introduced as a new sex toy offering dual stimulation. It comes in two models, Gizi and OG, and uses two motors for internal and external stimulation. The product is described as a one-stop shop for G-spot and clitoral stimulation, with a unique 'slide and roll' technology.

articles.title: [브레이크뉴스] 삼성전자, ‘갤럭시 S25 시리즈' 최단 기간 국내 100만대 판매 돌파
articles.author: 정민우 기자
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched the Galaxy S25 series, achieving a record of 1 million units sold in Korea within 21 days. The Galaxy S25 Ultra model, featuring a 200-megapixel camera, accounted for approximately 50% of sales, and the 'New Galaxy AI Subscription Club' contributed to the sales success.

articles.title: Tineco Unveils Two Revolutionary Floor Washers with Super New Arrival Promotion Starting from February 28th
articles.author: Tineco
articles.summary: Tineco launched two new floor washers, the Floor One S9 Artist and Floor One Switch S7 Stretch, on February 28th, 2025. The Floor One S9 Artist reduces handholding effort and features a slim design for cleaning under furniture. The Floor One Switch S7 Stretch is a 5-in-1 cleaning tool with advanced washing capabilities and a powerful vacuum cleaner, and a roadshow will be held on March 5th at Pavilion Damansara Heights to showcase the products.

articles.title: Nokod Security: Interview With Co-Founder & CEO Yair Finzi About The Application Security Company
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Nokod Security provides a security platform specializing in visibility, detection, and remediation of security issues within applications created by no-code, robotic process automation (RPA), and AI platforms. The platform supports platforms such as Microsoft Power Platform, ServiceNow, and UiPath. The company differentiates itself by offering remediation of security issues at scale through automation and addressing critical security challenges arising from digital transformation in the no-code domain.

articles.title: This Bose Bluetooth Speaker Is The 'Gold Standard' For Sound Quality
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Bose has released the SoundLink Flex, a Bluetooth speaker touted for its exceptional sound quality, waterproof and dustproof design, and portability.  The speaker features wireless connectivity, a built-in microphone for calls, and up to 12 hours of battery life on a single charge. User reviews highlight its impressive sound, durability, and ease of use for both indoor and outdoor activities.

articles.title: This $100 Android phone reminded me of my Pixel 9 Pro in the best way
articles.author: Jack Wallen
articles.summary: NUU launched the NUU N30 smartphone, now available on Amazon for $129. The NUU N30 features a 6.7-inch HD+ display with a 90Hz refresh rate, an Octa-core CPU, 6GB of RAM, 128GB of storage, a 50MP AI-powered main camera, and a 5000mAh battery.

articles.title: Monmouth businesswoman earns Dragons' Den's SNOAP backing
articles.author: Elizabeth Birt
articles.summary: SNOAP, founded by Lisa Hicks, launched the SNOAP Dispenser, a solid soap dispensing system designed to reduce plastic waste from hand, hair, and body washing. The company secured a £50,000 investment on Dragons' Den from Peter Jones and Deborah Meaden after receiving offers from all five Dragons.

articles.title: Cardi B x Cistto: A Case Study On A Small Beauty Brand's Big Investment In A TikTok Moment
articles.author: Tanya Benedicto Klich
articles.summary: Cistto launched a disposable cleansing oil with a nano delivery system, gaining popularity initially in China and now aiming for the U.S. market. The company partnered with Cardi B to promote the product, resulting in a significant increase in sales. Cistto is focusing on high-quality products and dermatologist endorsements to sustain this growth.

articles.title: Perfect Moment to Attend the 37th Annual ROTH Conference, March 17-18, 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Moment Ltd., a luxury skiwear and lifestyle brand, fuses technical excellence with fashion-led designs.

articles.title: Breaking! Trump Media Group Files Trademark for Potential Metaverse Project
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: The 'TRUMP' brand intends to launch a metaverse offering immersive experiences. This metaverse aims to encompass virtual restaurants, concerts, and an online store for digital and luxury products. The initiative extends the brand into the virtual realm with a new service offering.

articles.title: MWC 2025: Amdocs Opens GenAI-Focused Experience Lab in North America, Showcasing Leading-Edge Generative AI Capabilities ...
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Amdocs has launched the Amdocs Experience Lab, a facility focused on next-generation customer experiences. The lab features solutions from Amazon Web Services, Dell, Microsoft, NVIDIA, and OpenAI and demonstrates Amdocs' commitment to technology-enabled innovation in the realm of GenAI.

articles.title: BGMI-maker Tencent's latest AI model to compete with China's DeepSeek
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Tencent has launched a new AI model designed to compete with DeepSeek's R1 AI model. This launch follows DeepSeek's own AI model release, which had a significant impact on the tech industry. The launch of Tencent's AI model is aimed at rivaling DeepSeek in the Chinese market.

articles.title: McDonald's reveals $1 breakfast meal deals: See what you can get for the price
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing a new way for customers to save money on breakfast orders.

articles.title: Fairy: Revolutionizing Mobile Entrepreneurship with a Cutting-Edge Marketplace Platform
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Fairy, a marketplace platform, has launched to enable local service providers and goods sellers to directly connect with customers. It is designed for mobile entrepreneurs such as hairstylists and tutors.

articles.title: ASICS is dropping the new GEL-CUMULUS-27 running shoe and it's even more comfortable — here's ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: ASICS is preparing to launch the next generation of their GEL-CUMULUS Running Shoe. This new iteration promises to be an improvement over previous versions.

articles.title: Wix Business Launcher vs GoDaddy Airo: Which is better for small businesses?
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Wix and GoDaddy offer platforms that assist individuals in turning ideas into businesses. The article implicitly compares their services.

articles.title: Yiwu, China: Merchants Use AI Tools like DeepSeek to Do Business
articles.author: 作者：王梓元
articles.summary: Merchants in Yiwu International Trade City are utilizing DeepSeek and Xiaoshang AI Video Creation to automatically generate product promotion videos in over 20 languages. These AI-generated videos have successfully attracted both domestic and foreign orders, demonstrating the practical application and positive impact of these AI services.

articles.title: 'NDB Talking Calendar' wins Silver at Effie Awards 2024
articles.summary: NDB Bank won a Silver Award at the Effie Awards 2024 for its innovative interactive AI Calendar, which provides an immersive customer experience. The AI calendar exemplifies NDB's efforts to innovate and deliver transformative experiences and solidify its position as a leader in the digital banking space.

articles.title: 7-Eleven Singapore Unveils All-in-One App for Ultimate Convenience
articles.author: Irone Kim
articles.summary: 7-Eleven has launched a new mobile app in Singapore that allows customers to order ahead, pay in-app, and pick up items from over 450 stores. The app also features a loyalty program where customers can earn stamps and redeem them for free products and exclusive rewards. Additionally, the app offers bulk-buy vouchers and exclusive licensed merchandise.
